a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 494 × 321 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 208 pixels | 640 × 416 pixels | 800 × 520 pixels | 1,024 × 665 pixels | 1,280 × 832 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 494 × 321 pixels, file size: 29 KB)

tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

table.style: border:2px solid #D3D3D3; width:100%; background-color:#F8F8F8; text-align:center; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this flag image:

td.div: Беларуская: Першапачатковы «Мядзведжы сцяг», 14 чэрвеня 1846 - 9 ліпеня 1846
Čeština: První Medvědí vlajka (1846)
Deutsch: Flagge der Republik Kalifornien
English: The original flag of the California Republic
Esperanto: Flago de la Respubliko Kalifornio
Español: La bandera original de la República de California
فارسی: بازسازی دیجیتالی پرچم خرس اولیه
Suomi: Kalifornian tasavallan käyttämä karhulippu. Samaa pohjaa on käytetty myös Kalifornian nykyisessä lipussa.
日本語: カリフォルニア共和国の国旗（1846年まで）
Nederlands: Eerste Bear Flag (digitale reproductie)
Norsk bokmål: Californiarepublikkens flagg. "Bjørneflagget", Californiarepublikkens offisielle flagg og forgjengeren til dagens flagg
Kapampangan: Ing Banderang Bear ning Republica ning California
Português: Reprodução digital baseada na original bandeira do urso. Bandeira da República da Califórnia.
Русский: Первоначальный флаг Калифорнийской республики
Slovenčina: Digitálna reprodukcia originálnej Medvedej vlajky z roku 1846
Svenska: Republiken Kalifornien. Rekonstruktion av den första flaggan.
Tagalog: Watawat ng Republika ng California
Українська: Прапор Каліфорнійської Республіки
中文: 原版熊旗，1890年绘制.
English: Self made, based on Image:Firstbearflag.jpg

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

td.div: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

tr.td: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This flag was created with Inkscape.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

div.i: This media file is in the public domain in the United States. This applies to U.S. works where the copyright has expired, often because its first publication occurred prior to January 1, 1924, and if not then due to lack of notice or renewal. See this page for further explanation.

small.div: This image might not be in the public domain outside of the United States; this especially applies in the countries and areas that do not apply the rule of the shorter term for US works, such as Canada, Mainland China (not Hong Kong or Macao), Germany, Mexico, and Switzerland. The creator and year of publication are essential information and must be provided. See Wikipedia:Public domain and Wikipedia:Copyrights for more details.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

tr.td: Adjusted the colors to be closer to the flag made by William Ide
